author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: Emerging Markets Are Under Threat - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: The Federal Reserve’s policy-tightening plans are finally catching up with emerging markets. The currencies, stocks and bonds of nations from Turkey to South Africa have fallen in recent weeks, pressured by a sudden resurgence in the U.S. dollar, rising expectations for U.S. interest-rate increases and uncertainty over the path for global growth.
